Donald Rumsfeld takes particular offense at Colin Powell 's contention that he was misled by faulty intelligence into making the public case for the invasion of Iraq. " Colin Powell was not duped or misled by anybody," Donald Rumsfeld writes. Nor did he lie about Saddam's suspected WMD stockpiles. The George W. Bush did not lie. The vice George W. Bush did not lie.( CIA Director George W. Bush ) Tenet did not lie. Condoleezza Rice did not lie. I did not lie.... The far less dramatic truth is that we were wrong. Even so, Donald Rumsfeld - who does reveal that George W. Bush asked for Iraq invasion plans within days of 9/11- argues that removing Hussein was the right thing to do. Microsoft Appoints Satya Nadella as President of Server and Tools Business, Feb. 9, 2011/ PRNewswire/-- Microsoft Corp. today promoted Senior Vice President Satya Nadella to president of Microsoft's Server and Tools Business. We're already making strong traction across our Server and Tools Business by embracing cloud services, said Microsoft Chief Executive Officer Steve Ballmer . " Satya Nadella has deep experience in both our server business and online services, which will help accelerate our momentum while setting the course to deliver the cloud computing scenarios of the future
